title: Red Hair

nouns: A unique hair color that stands out.

description: A person with vibrant red hair, often associated with a fiery personality or unique style.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the red hair emoji cascades with a vibrant, fiery crimson, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that gives each strand a realistic, flowing texture. The soft, rounded edges and subtle highlights suggest a natural sheen, making it a vivid representation of this striking hair color. This emoji is perfect for personalizing avatars on Apple devices or expressing oneself with a bold, energetic flair.
